s: I have 2 PelPro 130’s. I took the OEM ignighter out of this stove and moved to my other one. Installed one of these and it wouldn’t light. The connectors were way too tight. My fingers hurt after trying to get these ones connected. I tried switching the connectors and getting them tighter and it still wouldn’t light. I bought a different brand ...

t: Pelpro - Toolmart
s: The Pelpro BTU Pellet Stove is compact and powerful. At 89% efficient, this stove delivers more heat using less fuel. Its large 70-lb. hopper provides continuous heat for up to two days, and its powerful 265 CFM variable-speed blower distributes heat throughout your home, heating up to 2000 sq.
